mapper.select: SELECT /* COGCntsMapper.getCntsListCnt */ count(*) FROM CO_CNTS_MST WHERE MENU_SEQ = #{menuSeq}

select /* COGCntsMapper.selectCntsList */ menu_seq , SEQ , VER , CNTS , JS_CNTS , PRCS_CD , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_DTM from CO_CNTS_MST A where MENU_SEQ = #{menuSeq} order by REG_DTM desc
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(VER)+1,1) VER FROM CO_CNTS_MST WHERE MENU_SEQ = #{menuSeq}

select /* COGCntsMapper.getCmsDtl */ menu_seq , SEQ , VER , CNTS , JS_CNTS , PRCS_CD , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_DTM from CO_CNTS_MST A where MENU_SEQ = #{menuSeq} AND PRCS_CD = 10
